channel.title: Changeing the looks of running(317)
channel.description:
is there a way to change the emote for running in the client.java?
im trying to make the way the character runs is the fly emote
(will stay live on the fourm here)
also not sure it belongs here :S

item.title: Changeing the looks of running(317)
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok what i suggest is you search on the fourms for a 317 emote list and then look for the 1 that says run or walk. then once u get the id then search in your client.java and or go to search and type the id of the walking or running. and find out what folder the anamation is located and change the walking/ running id to (1500) which is flying

Read full topic

item.title: Changeing the looks of running(317)
item.dc:creator: @gooasco gooasco
item.description:
@gooasco wrote:

no becasue im doing it as a few day event so i want to change the way the player runs as flying

Read full topic

item.title: Changeing the looks of running(317)
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

how about a ::fly command?
so when u type ::fly you can fly around the world?
if so i can send u the command code
